attributes.action: make it illegal to smoke in any vehicle in containing children under the age of 16 years, punishable by a fixed penality notice and fine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children have the right to grow up in the best environment possible and cannot easily say no to being in a vehicle with a smoker(s) as they are effectively trapped in an enclosed space with passive smoke.
